message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
I'll meet you halfway, but I still think I should get a bit more
You're getting desperate, I'm making a strong move
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve a better share
You're getting closer to the edge, I'm not giving up
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm getting close to my limit
You're running out of time, I'm making my final move
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm really running out of options
You're almost out of time, this is my last serious offer
This is my last offer, take it or leave it
I'll take it all, you're out of options
